result.reason: The connection logic in PuttyBase.Connect synchronously blocks the UI thread while waiting for the PuTTY window handle, causing a perceived hang when authentication fails and PuTTY displays a modal error dialog.
result.approach: Refactor the window handle discovery loop in PuttyBase.Connect to use a non-blocking async/timer-based pattern, ensuring the UI remains responsive while waiting for the PuTTY process to initialize or report an error.
